summary.title: Healthcare Patient Portal STRIDE Model
summary.description: This STRIDE diagram identifies and categorizes potential security threats in the Healthcare Patient Portal system, including login authentication, medical record access, and appointment booking.

diagrams.description: This diagram models the main components of the Healthcare Patient Portal and identifies potential security threats using the STRIDE methodology, including login, medical record access, and appointment booking.
